page.title: 13Children and Leisure.
page.content: The children aged 11 and 12 years old spend their leisure time in a variety of ways.Bicycle rides are very popular and in the summer the children spend as much time as possible out of doors.As there are many private swimming pools in the locality,swimming facilities are available to many children because their parents work for the owners. Parents also pay for private swimming tuition. Football is a popular pastime with the boys even in summer.They also spend many hours in the woods,walking the dog or climbing trees. Nearly all the children are members of a Monday youth group when the leader organises games and outings to an ice- rink or places of interest.Some boys help on the farm feeding calves and also help dad in the garden.Summer school courses are also popular.
